Reviews.Title: Great Camara for the price
Reviews.Author: Oscar
Reviews.Content: This is a great camara for the price. The pictures look great, not only in the computer or when I print them at home. They look just super when I reproduce them at the photoshop or supercenter. And it looks real great. People ask me for the camara when they see it or see the pictures. It's like a professional camara that you don't have to do nothing but shoot the picture. The battery life is very good too.

Reviews.Title: Excellent item
Reviews.Author: Bill "Bill"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent product for the intended use and cost.  Only thing to consider is that it seems to consume AA batteries rather fast but keeping a good supply on hand solves that problem.  Features available for a camera this size are excellent.

Reviews.Title: A good camera.
Reviews.Author: sunnyboard
Reviews.Content: Alright, this is really a good camera. I've had various cameras before. This is by far the least expensive camera I've ever bought, but not the least in quality. This camera takes good pictures, especially when there is a well lit area. In low light it's not as good, but I take most of my pictures outside anyways. So, I suggest that if you are getting this for a vacation or mostly outdoor pictures, it's a really great choice. Oh yeah, and it's a great price too! I would definitely recommend this camera to a someone I know. This camera has a lot of features, and honestly, it's not that hard to figure them out. I'm definitely not an expert at figuring out these things most of the time, but I just played around with it for about 20 minutes and I know how to use about 35 different things already. This can be a very fun camera to own. The blue is a little darker than the one shown in the pictures, but it actually looks nicer. If you want a camera under 100 dollars, this is, in my opinion, a great great choice.

Reviews.Title: Nice one.
Reviews.Author: Srivatsan "srisathyam"
Reviews.Content: My in-laws seem to like this cam.. Havenot personally used it yet. However, the picture they sent me seems to point to a very good buy.

Reviews.Title: too slow, too bright, too blurry, no zoom on video, too much work
Reviews.Author: Jona
Reviews.Content: This camera IS TERRIBLE. We are average camera users who take pictures of our daily lives--kids, friends, travels, random every day objects (kids' toys set ups, flowers outside, frost on the grass, etc...), food, etc... WE are not at all professional.TOO SLOW: Talk about major delay when pressing the shutter button. Everyone's smiles become fake (held too long). It takes 3-4 shots to get the right one. And by that time, everyone (if it's a small or big group pictures) is done. Not a great camera for candid moments. By the time the pictures are taken, the moments were already missed. You pretty much have to plan to take 2 seconds ahead to get the picture you want. But that's impossible for candid shots. I have awesome cameras that take the picture as SOON as you click (Kodak EasyShare V610 and Canon Digital Rebel XSi).TOO BRIGHT: On AUTO MODE--- Hardly did I get a nice normal picture. MOST are TOO BRIGHT or TOO DARK. My husband HATED it. He couldn't believe how terrible this camera is. He my picture of what he got me for Christmas and couldn't believe how blurry and bright it was. Not too mention I'm sitting still.TOO BLURRY:  14MP really?  more like less than 6MP.  Moving kids---FORGET IT. Still objects--TERRIBLE! Forget about thinking of blowing up the picture to bigger than 4x6. If it's blurry on review mode, it will be blurry on print (hard copy). Blurriness goes for video mode as well. NO ANTI-SHAKE CAPABILITIES....NO ZOOM on VIDEO mode:  Before taking a video, you have to focus your camera, by letting it sit on the object you're about to take a video of (VERY HARD when it's moving objects like kids. TERRIBLE since that's what video mode is all about anyways--MOVEMENT. If you record and the pictures are blurry to begin with, the video will be blurry all throughout the takes. When the pictures are decently clear, then that's when you click record (shutter button). Then I found out NO ZOOM on video mode, so you pretty much have to follow your object around. I was taking a video of our son riding his new scooter around the backyard. The zoom on video mode while it's on WOULD've been NICE.THIS CAMERA IS EXHAUSTING TO WORK WITH. IT'S NOT WORTH THE PRICE. MOVING ON TO ANOTHER MINI DIGITAL CAMERA......

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: Aminta Velasquez "avea75"
Reviews.Content: Producto de muy buena calidad. Imagenes nitidas, fácil manejo, tamaño cómodo. Sólo requiere pilas para funcionar. Funcionan perfectamente todas las funciones indicadas en manual.

Reviews.Title: Exllent camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Mad man "Marvin"
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift for my daughter. Has a lot of the same features as my more expensive camera and more MB. Easy to use form the get go. Uses standard batteries, which has its plusses and minusses (battery life and no charger). Photo transfer via usb or card reader is a snap, no extra software required. Good value for the money.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: Richard
Reviews.Content: A good camera with sharp images thanks to its zoom and 14 MP, a large LCD display for easy reading. recommended.

Reviews.Title: buen articulo
Reviews.Author: gregorio.
Reviews.Content: fue rápida la entrega , el articulo se encontraba en buen estado a mi esposa le encanto la cámara es fácil de usar y la fotos salen muy nítidas me encanto. el vendedor cumplió con lo estimado volvería a comprarle con los ojos cerrados es muy confiable. desde Venezuela.

Reviews.Title: digital camera
Reviews.Author: Florencia
Reviews.Content: I think it's a good camera, the only thing I don't like is that I need to carry the batteries because they get low in a short period of time. The pictures are good, and is very easy to put them in the computer.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: celly
Reviews.Content: i love the color  and the camera takes great pictures It is easy to operater and the screen is large enough to view the subject clearly

Reviews.Title: dissatisfied
Reviews.Author: kevinchriw
Reviews.Content: this product had or have a black mark going across the screen, like ink, that keep getting bigger and bigger, i report it to the seller, they are telling me that i have to send it back in the original box with all the papers, for a refund, I told them i will perfer get a replacement cause first of all, i distroy the original boxes, and second i am no longer in the state, and it would be hard to send it back, or expensive to send it back from the bahamas. they said, i have to send it back with all the papers for a refundso i am stuck with a camera that have ink or dark dust across the face

ProductInfo.Features:
14-megapixel resolution for high-quality, poster-size prints
5x optical zoom
AF tracking; Intelligent Auto
Advanced Face Detection and Creative Art Filters
Capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus FE-47 14 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 2.7-inch LCD (Blue)
